name: GHOST TRANSITION III: THE KOWLOON RENDEZVOUS
name_original: GHOST TRANSITION III: THE KOWLOON RENDEZVOUS
description:
After learning to TRANSITION, JACK MOON finally returns to this beloved franchise of beat 'em up games designed by moi-soft for the Nintendo Super Famicom.

Made for Transgender Awareness Week 2022 along with:

https://openarcade.itch.io/how-should-i-pee

Refer to the diagram on the right side for keyboard controls.
